name: Amrutsagar Agrotech
overview:
Established in the year 1993, we, “Amrutsagar Agrotech Sales & Service”, are a renowned firm, which is engaged in manufacturing and supplying an extensive assembly of Pipes, Fittings, Fertigation Equipment and Sprinkler Systems. Offered products are High Density Polyethylene Pipe, Prelubricated Polyethylene Pipe, CPVC Plastic Pipe, PPR Water Pipe and PVC Plastic Pipe, to name a few.

Team & Manpower: Engineers Technicians Quality controllers Warehouse professionals Skilled & semi-skilled workers Sales and marketing executives

Quality Assurance: Quality always remain an impeccable aspect, which enables us to reach an apex level in this stiff market competition. Hence, we have constructed a sophisticated testing laboratory, which is equipped with highly modern machines and latest technology that aid us in delivering a flawless assembly of Pipes, Fittings, Fertigation Equipment and Sprinkler Systems.

Our Infrastructure: We have constructed an advanced infrastructure, which helps us in controlling the business related activities smoothly and systematically. The facility is installed with all the essential amenities that are needed for offering a comprehensive range of Pipes, Fittings, Fertigation Equipment and Sprinkler Systems.

Client Satisfaction: We are able to attain maximum satisfaction of our clients, by delivering an unparalleled assembly of Pipes, Fittings, Fertigation Equipment and Sprinkler Systems. Offered range is developed using optimum grade raw material and advanced technology in conformation with the highest quality norms and standards.
